physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings are decorated with panels depicting stylized foliage, birds, elephants, and deities. The panels are bordered by scrolling geometric patterns. The circumference of the hangings are decorated with colourful fringe.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) deities depictions (visual works) geometric motifs birds (motifs) beadwork (visual works)
